text: Haxhi Ballgjini (born 15 June 1958) is a former Albanian footballer who played for Dinamo Tirana, Partizani Tirana, Vllaznia Shkodër and Partizani Tirana and Lokomotiva Durrës, as well as the Albania national team.Vëllezërit Ballgjini, futbollistët e shquar durrsakeHaxhi Ballgjini, figurë e shquar e futbollit durrsak dhe atij kombëtar ==International career== He made his debut for Albania in a November 1976 friendly match against Algeria and earned a total of 15 caps, scoring 1 goal. His final international was a February 1985 FIFA World Cup qualification match against Greece. ==Managerial career== Ballgjini managed hometown club Teuta to their first and only league title in 1994.Trajnerë kampionë, por të papunë - Telegraf ==Personal life== His older brother Shyqyri Ballgjini also played for Albania and they were the first brothers to play for the national side together in 1981 against Finland.Vëllezërit e Kombëtares, nga Ballgjinët te Bashat - Telegraf ==Honours== as a player *Albanian Superliga: 1 :: 1981 Albania - Championship Winning Teams - RSSSF as a coach *Albanian Superliga: 1 :: 1994 ==References== ==External links== * Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Durrës Category:Association football midfielders Category:Albanian footballers Category:Albania under-21 international footballers Category:Albania international footballers Category:FK Dinamo Tirana players Category:FK Partizani Tirana players Category:KF Vllaznia Shkodër players Category:KF Teuta Durrës players Category:Albanian Superliga players Category:Albanian football managers Category:KF Teuta Durrës managers
title: Haxhi Ballgjini
